list_definition.definition: freedom from captivity or from slavery

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He ordered that all prisoners should be given their liberty.

list_definition.definition: freedom to do as one pleases

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Children have a lot more liberty now than they used to.

list_definition.definition: (especially with take) too great freedom of speech or action

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I think it was (taking) a liberty to ask her such a question!
